name: The Art of The Last of Us
summary: Naughty Dog Studios and Dark Horse proudly present the essential companion to The Last of Us, a richly detailed and compelling game set in a postpandemic world where humans have become an endangered species. Featuring concept art, character designs, and astonishing settings and landscapes, The Art of The Last of Us provides a unique look at one of the gaming world's most eagerly anticipated titles.
info:
• 出版社: Dark Horse Books
  • 价格: $39.99
  • 发售日: 2013-06-18
